name: algosigner
author: https://developer.purestake.io
description: Sign Algorand transactions in your browser with PureStake.

scripts.copy: cp ./packages/extension/build/* dist/ && cp -r ./packages/ui/dist/* dist/ && cp ./packages/dapp/dist/* dist/
scripts.builddapp: cd ./packages/dapp && npm install --loglevel=error && npm run build && npm run bundle && cd ../..
scripts.buildui: cd ./packages/ui && npm install --loglevel=error && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.build: npm run buildcommon && npm run buildcrypto  && npm run buildstorage && npm run buildui && npm run buildextension && npm run builddapp && npm run copy
scripts.install: cd ./packages/common && npm install && cd ../.. && cd ./packages/crypto && npm install && cd ../.. && cd ./packages/storage && npm install && cd ../.. && cd ./packages/extension && npm install && cd ../..
